channel.title: CVE Feed for Recruit Co., Ltd. -- Hot Pepper Gourmet App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Recruit Co., Ltd. -- Hot Pepper Gourmet App

item.title: CVE-2021-20715|2024-08-03T17:53:21.814Z -- recruit%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- hot%20pepper%20gourmet%20app
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Hot Pepper Gourmet App for Android ver.4.111.0 and earlier, and for iOS ver.4.111.0 and earlier allows a remote attacker to lead a user to access an arbitrary website via the vulnerable App.
